caption.title: Mean size of Platygyra acuta recruits.
caption.p: Mean (+SE) size (mm 2) of Platygyra acuta recruits in response to different temperature and salinity treatments. Number in () under each set of data represents number of replicates. Data indicated with the same letter showed no significant difference in the recruit sizes (Two-way ANOVA, P > 0.05; Table 1C).
